text: Kɨ uaghan kamaghɨn ifonge, amiziba korotiar aghuibar aghutɨ, da men tughatɨgham. Eghtɨ men korotiaba, igharaz darazi men ganɨva nɨghnɨzir kuraba ko aghumsɨzir nɨghnɨziba ikian kogham. Me uan dapanir arɨziba mɨghvɨra da asɨngan markɨ, egh uan mɨkarziba, manmaniaba ko gol ko korotiar bar pɨn koziba, puram azenan dar kurukan markɨ.
